concept.title: SMC PGI 5304.804 Closeout of Contract Files

conbody.p: SMC/PKX is the focal point for contract closeout of all actions awarded in ConWrite. Each COCO is responsible for assigning a contract closeout point of contact and alternate to work with SMC/PKX to accomplish timely closeout of contract files.
